label: A4B17C_cF88_216_e_aefg_c-001
title: Cubic Cr$_{4}$PtGa$_{17}$ Structure
comments: (Gui, 2021) describe this compound as a rhombohedral structure in space group $R3m$ \#160, a distortion of the \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC_cF12_216_a_c_b-001}{half-Heusler ($C1_{b}$) structure}. Uncertainty in the atomic positions leads to this cubic structure, which we use as the prototype.
